unnormalised: Breaking News: Local resident, Kumari. Anjali Mishra, recently celebrated her 100th birthday! The centenarian, lovingly known as "Dadi" by her family and neighbors in Lucknow, enjoyed a small gathering at her residence. Among the attendees were close relatives, including her grandson, Mr. Rohan Mishra, and several great-grandchildren.
normalised: Breaking News: Local resident, Kumari Anjali Mishra, recently celebrated her one hundredth birthday! The centenarian, lovingly known as "Dadi" by her family and neighbors in Lucknow, enjoyed a small gathering at her residence. Among the attendees were close relatives, including her grandson, Mister Rohan Mishra, and several great-grandchildren.

unnormalised: "Dadi" Mishra, a retired schoolteacher, has been a pillar of the community for decades. Sources say that she actively participated in social initiatives and was known for her wisdom and kindness. Many recall her insightful advice and her cheerful disposition. The celebrations included a traditional cake-cutting ceremony followed by a hearty meal, with all her favorite dishes.
normalised: "Dadi" Mishra, a retired schoolteacher, has been a pillar of the community for decades. Sources say that she actively participated in social initiatives and was known for her wisdom and kindness. Many recall her insightful advice and her cheerful disposition. The celebrations included a traditional cake-cutting ceremony followed by a hearty meal, with all her favorite dishes.

unnormalised: "It's a truly special occasion," exclaimed Ms. Sharma, a neighbor, "Dadi ji has touched so many lives. We are lucky to have her!" Various community members visited the "Dadi" and gave her flowers and blessed her. A small puja was performed on her behalf for her well-being.
